topic.title: Test this
topic.body: I want to build some sites but i want to make sure things are configured can someone download my test site? http://127.0.0.1:43110/14GHGnNZmwx2jjQZGm9AFTz3gEVGz1HTbd/

1606498254_1JuH625YcbVeN6ve7xDXVUkVcoRHg.body:
> [jeff](#comment_2_1JFfyAT1DysW4LbK6WRd2szDoPjWgb22NT): CONNECTING...TRACKERS ANNOUNCING: 1, ERROR: 44, DONE: 103PEERS FOUND: 2CONTENT.JSON DOWNLOAD FAILED

ok try again....

And thank you for helping..

> [bats](#comment_1_1QvU5RXqw5mjgR3BZV5rkc2ju6NHXpGnp): No peers found

ok try again....

And thank you for helping
it does now show 2 peers so someone is connected....?

Zeronet says my port is closed, could that prevent you from downloading the site? Cant change router settings. 

Also if i run it over Tor, would that solve the port problem since its on another network?

> [jeff](#comment_5_1JFfyAT1DysW4LbK6WRd2szDoPjWgb22NT): Got a doggie in a hardhat saying Under Construction! So you're making progress.Page address: 14GHGnNZmwx2jjQZGm9AFTz3gEVGz1HTbd [...]

YES!


Thanks i switched over to TOR so that may have helped.
i wanted to swtich cause i was playing around with 0net a few years ago and remember something about this issue. 

Do you use Tor with Zeronet?

> [jeff](#comment_6_1JFfyAT1DysW4LbK6WRd2szDoPjWgb22NT): Well good! I have Tor enabled, but it's not forced for all sites.

I updated the site could you let me know if you get the change? and confirm what that change is? i add some text..

Again thank you

> [jeff](#comment_7_1JFfyAT1DysW4LbK6WRd2szDoPjWgb22NT): It says "Thanks to everyone that helped to Test this site!!!!!." now.Page address: 14GHGnNZmwx2jjQZGm9AFTz3gEVGz1HTbd [...]

Cool thanks for you help.

Do you run any zeronet sites? 
Also  i want to make some sites have some ideas.... but what are some you feel is needed, as far as content?

> [jeff](#comment_8_1JFfyAT1DysW4LbK6WRd2szDoPjWgb22NT): No, i don't run any sites.

Do you have zero mail by chance? would not mind having more conversation.
